content.text: Every time I get to a party I make comparisons in my head. Are people more handsome here than in the last party? Is this party more fun? I mean, I cannot help it. It comes naturally to me. I think observing carefully makes me more intelligent and provides more interesting facts to share with people. It is better to know where you are and who you are with, isn't it? The latest party was in a bigger house than the one before. That house was also more elegant. Nevertheless, I felt happier in the party before that one. People were more energetic and more honest. I guess it's different for everyone, but I prefer certain things more than others.
